sqlMap.update:
update sync_status
user_id = #userId:BIGINT#
rate_start_time = #rateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#
last_rate_start_time = #lastRateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#
last_rate_end_time = #lastRateEndTime:TIMESTAMP#
last_rate_sync_start_time = #lastRateSyncStartTime:TIMESTAMP#
last_rate_sync_end_time = #lastRateSyncEndTime:TIMESTAMP#

rate_sync_owner = #rateSyncOwner:VARCHAR#

last_calc_seller_day_rate_end_time = #lastCalcSellerDayRateEndTime:TIMESTAMP#
calc_seller_day_rate_status = #calcSellerDayRateStatus:TINYINT#
calc_seller_day_rate_owner = #calcSellerDayRateOwner:VARCHAR#
upd_time = #updTime:TIMESTAMP#
add_time = #addTime:TIMESTAMP#
where id = #id:INTEGER#

update sync_status set user_id = #userId:BIGINT#, rate_start_time = #rateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#, last_rate_start_time = #lastRateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#, last_rate_end_time = #lastRateEndTime:TIMESTAMP#, last_rate_sync_start_time = #lastRateSyncStartTime:TIMESTAMP#, last_rate_sync_end_time = #lastRateSyncEndTime:TIMESTAMP#, rate_sync_status = #rateSyncStatus:TINYINT#, rate_sync_owner = #rateSyncOwner:VARCHAR#, last_calc_seller_day_rate_start_time = #lastCalcSellerDayRateStartTime:TIMESTAMP#, last_calc_seller_day_rate_end_time = #lastCalcSellerDayRateEndTime:TIMESTAMP#, calc_seller_day_rate_status = #calcSellerDayRateStatus:TINYINT#, calc_seller_day_rate_owner = #calcSellerDayRateOwner:VARCHAR#, upd_time = #updTime:TIMESTAMP#, add_time = #addTime:TIMESTAMP# where id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from sync_status where rate_sync_owner = #rateSyncOwner:VARCHAR#
rate_sync_status=#statusList[]#
sqlMap.select:
select user_id from sync_status where user_id > #hitUserId:BIGINT#
calc_seller_day_rate_status=#statusList[]#
limit 0, #pageSize:INTEGER#
